value.0:
The Basics of Leather Working:

You will require access to proper materials such as soft or hard skins. Then, you must have access to a proper workstation, a tanning basin is required for leather working.

Sling:
To create a sling, start with the rack twice.  Then use the knife and the basin.  Finish with the rack and the knife again.

Whip:
A whip requies the knife, followed by to sessions on the rack.  Use the basin, the knife and the rack again.

Leather Armor:
This required that you use the rack twice then the basin.  Move on to two cuts with the knife and finish on the rack.

Studded Leather Armor:
Begin with two cuts of the knife.  Then put it on the rack.  Use the basin then back to the rack.  Finish with the knife.

A tailor can also work with leather:
Hood:
Use the basin, knife and basin again.  Move on to the knife, rack and basin.

Boots:
Begin with the basin and rack and repeat.  Followed by two cuts with the knife.

Belt:
Begin with the knife.  Then use the basin and knife again.  Use the knife.  Then finally the rack and basin.

Gloves:
Start with the rack then use the knife.  Move it to the basin, and then double the time on the rack.  Finish with the knife.
